channel.title: Creativity in Science on Juan Orozco
channel.description: Recent content in Creativity in Science on Juan Orozco

item.title: Inspirational Moment in History – First Steps on the Moon
item.description: This singular event inspired millions of people in one way or another.  Although walking on the moon wasn't necessarily creative, it took some of the most creative minds  to send three men across the void to our moon.  The arts are not the only place or "way" to be creative.  Science and mathematics require some creativity in order to make dreams come true. Like the one we are celebrating today.
